|brand = Linksys |model = WUSB54GX4 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = MM0 |wlclass = G108 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Female B |formfactor = corded (modular) adapter
|vendor_id = 13b1 |device_id = 0022 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = Q87-WUSB54GX4 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:18:39, 00:18:F8
|chip1 = Airgo;AGN303BB; |chip2 = Airgo;AGN312RF; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g |802.11g = 108 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/11/2006 |estreldate = 09/02/2006 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 745883569717 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B000HAWGAA |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== WUSB54GX4 serial numbers appear to start with '''MM0'''.
This device is using... *an '''Airgo''' AGN303BB-00 MAC/BB *an '''Airgo''' AGN312RF00 (chain 1) and AGN311RF00 (chain 2) *an [http://www.smsc.com/Products/USB/USB_Transceivers/USB3250 '''SMSC''' USB3250 (USB3250-ABZJ) USB 2.0 PHY]. *two [http://media.digikey.com/pdf/Data%20Sheets/Fairchild%20PDFs/RMPA2458.pdf '''Fairchild Semiconductor''' RMPA2458 2.4GHz PA]
{{WiFiCert|WFA4410|04/27/2006}}
